step.cmd: Read all instructions in this manual before using the Cuisinart ICE-60W.
To avoid electric shock, do not put cord, plug, or base in water or any other liquid.
Unplug the appliance when not in use and before cleaning.
Do not take the appliance out of the classroom for other use.
Clean parts only in the kitchen area of classroom 380.

messagepanel.howtoavoid: - Not for use by children without parental or adult supervision.
- Do not submerge the base in water.
- Do not take the base apart.
- Repairs should not be performed by students or faculty, only by Cuisinart employees or representatives.
